case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Near complete or complete skeleton
case_circumstances: The remains were located and recovered near the bank of the Feather River 1 1/4 miles west of Pulga in Yankee Hill, Ca approximately 75 ft below a Union Pacific Railroad bridge.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Blue jeans w/dark brown leather belt w/square metal buckle, blue waist-length jacket (Brand: Powder River), long sleeve cotton shirt grey and blue in color w/red sleeves.  Shirt had the word Arkansas on it w/a picture of an Arkansas Razorback mascot.
case_footwear: Black work boots (size 9W) w/ very worn soles.
case_jewelry: Gold Timex watch with a black nylon band.
case_other_items_with_body: Silver folding knife w/flower design on both sides.
dental: Dental information / charting is available and will be entered later
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
